name: apache在wamp中创建虚拟主机
body:
# 1.我现在用的是WampServer2.0i版本

在“httpd.conf”文件中查找：Include conf/extra/httpd-vhosts.conf，去掉前面的注释#。
如果安装在D盘那就是D:\wamp\bin\apache\apache2.2.8\conf\extra\httpd-vhosts.conf
用记事本打开  
# 2.打开在C:\WINDOWS\system32\drivers\etc中的hosts文件中加上你要的域名,例如：
    127.0.0.1    www.haha.com
# 3.修改httpd.conf文件：在文件内容的最下面加上如下  (下面的内容是两个虚拟主机的配置)
NameVirtualHost *:80
<VirtualHost *:80>
    ServerAdmin riathinker@gmail.com                              
    DocumentRoot d:/wamp/www/demo/
    ServerName www.haha.com
<Directory "d:/wamp/www/demo/">
Options FollowSymLinks
AllowOverride None
Order allow,deny
Allow from all
</Directory>
</VirtualHost>


说明:
ServerAdmin    riathinker@gmail.com  //管理员的邮箱
DocumentRoot d:/wamp/www/demo/       //网站目录
ServerName  demo.com//域名
<Directory "d:/wamp/www/demo/">                //目录的权限
Options FollowSymLinks
AllowOverride None
Order allow,deny
Allow from all
</Directory>
</VirtualHost>

 

也可以用里面自带的demo

<VirtualHost *:80>
    ServerAdmin riathinker@gmail.com
    DocumentRoot "c:/wamp/www/demo"
    ServerName demo.com
    ServerAlias http://www.demo.com/
    ErrorLog "logs/dummy-host.localhost-error.log"
    CustomLog "logs/dummy-host.localhost-access.log" common
</VirtualHost>

 


另外还有一种比较简单的方法，就是想httpd.conf里最下端直接添加

 NameVirtualHost 127.0.0.1


<VirtualHost 127.0.0.1>
    ServerAdmin riathinker@gmail.com
    DocumentRoot c:/wamp/www/demo
    ServerName localhost
</VirtualHost>

<VirtualHost ladderschool.com>
    ServerAdmin riathinker@gmail.com
    DocumentRoot c:/wamp/www/demo
    ServerName demo.com
    <Directory "c:/wamp/www/demo/">
      AllowOverride all
      Order Allow,Deny
      Allow from 127.0.0.1
    </Directory>
</VirtualHost>
